title: Restarted Love
overview: After years of marriage, young artist Lu Ming and his wife Xu Xin begin to grow emotionally distant, as their once-strong bond starts to crack. In a severe car accident, Xu Xin is critically injured and falls into a prolonged coma at the hospital. At home, Lu Ming discovers a stream-of-consciousness novel written by Xu Xin. Lu Ming realizes that the novel reflects Xu Xin's unspoken emotions and her deep love for him. After reading the novel, Lu Ming regrets his past actions and rewrites its ending. Eventually, Xu Xin awakens slowly to Lu Ming's callsâ€¦
